directory.name: components
directory.purpose: This directory, `src\components`, contains the source code for the individual components of a Todo application, including input, item display, list management, filtering, and statistics.

subdirectories.name: TodoApp
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `TodoApp` directory contains the source code for the components of a Todo application.

subdirectories.name: TodoFilters
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `TodoFilters` directory contains the source code for the components responsible for filtering tasks within a todo application.

subdirectories.name: TodoInput
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: This directory, `src\components\TodoInput`, contains the source code for the "TodoInput" component of a software project.

subdirectories.name: TodoItem
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: This directory, `src\components\TodoItem`, contains the source code for the `TodoItem` component within a larger project.

subdirectories.name: TodoList
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `src\components\TodoList` directory contains the source code for a "TodoList" component within a larger software project.

subdirectories.name: TodoStats
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `TodoStats` directory contains the source code for the components responsible for displaying statistics related to a to-do application.
